title: 服务器开不了了为什么
author: zcm1511
txt_content: 12.08 23:19:08 [Server] INFO Error: Unable to access jarfile minecraft_server.jar12.08 23:19:07 [Multicraft] Failed to copy jarfile from global JAR directory12.08 23:19:07 [Multicraft] JAR file not found, copying from global JAR directory12.08 23:19:07 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "Default Minecraft Server"12.08 23:19:07 [Multicraft] Starting server!12.08 23:19:07 [Multicraft] Loading server properties12.08 23:19:07 [Multicraft] Received start command

replies.author: Sorot
replies.txt_content:
Error: Unable to access jarfile minecraft_server.jar
报错信息，没有找到minecraft_server.jar 这个文件

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
似乎是Multicraft并没有找到你服务端的核心文件,于是从Multicraft内置的核心里面复制了一个,但没复制成功
自己上传下核心文件吧
或者联系服务商

replies.author: 1qw223
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
